sqlMap.select:
SELECT DATATIME as "datatime", MN as "mn", SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", FACTORID as "factorid", FACTORNAME as "factorname", CN as "cn", VALUEZS as "valuezs", ALARMTYPE as "alarmtype", ALARMSTATUS as "alarmstatus", ALARMINFO as "alarminfo", SENDTIME as "sendtime", SENDSTATUS as "sendstatus", FILLTIME as "filltime", FILLSTATUS as "fillstatus", FILLMAN as "fillman", FILLID as "fillid", PORTNAME as "portname", PORTID as "portid", HLIMIT as "hlimit", LOWLIMIT as "lowlimit", NKHLIMIT as "nkhlimit", NKLOWLIMIT as "nklowlimit", CONTROL_LINE as "controlLine", STANDARD_VALUE as "standardValue", VALUE_REAL as "valueReal", MONITORID as "monitorid", ST as "st", QN as "qn", FLAG as "flag", SITUATION_STATUS as "situationStatus" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT WHERE 1=1
DATATIME = #datatime#
SITEID = #siteid#
FACTORID = #factorid#
CN = #cn#
$orderBy$
DATATIME asc, SITEID asc, FACTORID asc, CN asc

SELECT t1.DATATIME as "datatime", t1.MN as "mn", t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.SITENAME as "sitename", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t1.CN as "cn", t1.VALUEZS as "valuezs", t1.ALARMTYPE as "alarmtype", t1.ALARMSTATUS as "alarmstatus", t1.ALARMINFO as "alarminfo", t1.SENDTIME as "sendtime", t1.SENDSTATUS as "sendstatus", t1.FILLTIME as "filltime", t1.FILLSTATUS as "fillstatus", t1.FILLMAN as "fillman", t1.FILLID as "fillid", t1.PORTNAME as "portname", t1.PORTID as "portid", t1.HLIMIT as "hlimit", t1.LOWLIMIT as "lowlimit", t1.NKHLIMIT as "nkhlimit", t1.NKLOWLIMIT as "nklowlimit", t1.CONTROL_LINE as "controlLine", t1.STANDARD_VALUE as "standardValue", t1.VALUE_REAL as "valueReal", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.ST as "st", t1.QN as "qn", t1.FLAG as "flag", t1.SITUATION_STATUS as "situationStatus" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE t2 ON t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID WHERE 1=1
t1.DATATIME >= #startTime#
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.DATATIME <= #endTime#
t1.ALARMTYPE = #alarmtype#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t1.SITUATION_STATUS = #situationStatus#
t1.CN = #cn#
t2.DEPARTID = #departid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID ASC, t1.ALARMTYPE ASC, t1.FACTORID ASC, t1.DATATIME ASC

SELECT DATATIME as "datatime", MN as "mn", SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", FACTORID as "factorid", FACTORNAME as "factorname", CN as "cn", VALUEZS as "valuezs", ALARMTYPE as "alarmtype", ALARMSTATUS as "alarmstatus", ALARMINFO as "alarminfo", SENDTIME as "sendtime", SENDSTATUS as "sendstatus", FILLTIME as "filltime", FILLSTATUS as "fillstatus", FILLMAN as "fillman", FILLID as "fillid", PORTNAME as "portname", PORTID as "portid", HLIMIT as "hlimit", LOWLIMIT as "lowlimit", NKHLIMIT as "nkhlimit", NKLOWLIMIT as "nklowlimit", CONTROL_LINE as "controlLine", STANDARD_VALUE as "standardValue", VALUE_REAL as "valueReal", MONITORID as "monitorid", ST as "st", QN as "qn", FLAG as "flag", SITUATION_STATUS as "situationStatus" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT WHERE 1=1
DATATIME like '$datatime$%'
SITEID = #siteid#
ALARMTYPE = #alarmtype#
$orderBy$
DATATIME asc, SITEID asc, FACTORID asc, CN asc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT WHERE 1=1
DATATIME = #datatime#
SITEID = #siteid#
FACTORID = #factorid#
CN = #cn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT (DATATIME, MN, SITEID, SITENAME, FACTORID, FACTORNAME, CN, VALUEZS, ALARMTYPE, ALARMSTATUS, ALARMINFO, SENDTIME, SENDSTATUS, FILLTIME, FILLSTATUS, FILLMAN, FILLID, PORTNAME, PORTID, HLIMIT, LOWLIMIT, NKHLIMIT, NKLOWLIMIT, CONTROL_LINE, STANDARD_VALUE, VALUE_REAL, MONITORID, ST, QN, FLAG, SITUATION_STATUS ) VALUES (#datatime:VARCHAR#, #mn:VARCHAR#, #siteid:VARCHAR#, #sitename:VARCHAR#, #factorid:VARCHAR#, #factorname:VARCHAR#, #cn:VARCHAR#, #valuezs:VARCHAR#, #alarmtype:VARCHAR#, #alarmstatus:VARCHAR#, #alarminfo:VARCHAR#, #sendtime:VARCHAR#, #sendstatus:VARCHAR#, #filltime:VARCHAR#, #fillstatus:VARCHAR#, #fillman:VARCHAR#, #fillid:VARCHAR#, #portname:VARCHAR#, #portid:VARCHAR#, #hlimit:VARCHAR#, #lowlimit:VARCHAR#, #nkhlimit:VARCHAR#, #nklowlimit:VARCHAR#, #controlLine:VARCHAR#, #standardValue:VARCHAR#, #valueReal:VARCHAR#, #monitorid:VARCHAR#, #st:VARCHAR#, #qn:VARCHAR#, #flag:VARCHAR#, #situationStatus:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT WHERE DATATIME = #datatime# AND SITEID = #siteid# AND FACTORID = #factorid# AND CN = #cn#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT SET MN = #mn#, SITENAME = #sitename#, FACTORNAME = #factorname#, VALUEZS = #valuezs#, ALARMTYPE = #alarmtype#, ALARMSTATUS = #alarmstatus#, ALARMINFO = #alarminfo#, SENDTIME = #sendtime#, SENDSTATUS = #sendstatus#, FILLTIME = #filltime#, FILLSTATUS = #fillstatus#, FILLMAN = #fillman#, FILLID = #fillid#, PORTNAME = #portname#, PORTID = #portid#, HLIMIT = #hlimit#, LOWLIMIT = #lowlimit#, NKHLIMIT = #nkhlimit#, NKLOWLIMIT = #nklowlimit#, CONTROL_LINE = #controlLine#, STANDARD_VALUE = #standardValue#, VALUE_REAL = #valueReal#, MONITORID = #monitorid#, ST = #st#, QN = #qn#, FLAG = #flag#, SITUATION_STATUS = #situationStatus# WHERE DATATIME = #datatime# AND SITEID = #siteid# AND FACTORID = #factorid# AND CN = #cn#

UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT SET FILLID = #fillid#, SITUATION_STATUS = #situationStatus#
WHERE DATATIME like '$datatime$%' AND SITEID = #siteid# AND ALARMTYPE = #alarmtype# AND FACTORID = #factorid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT t1.DATATIME as "datatime", t1.MN as "mn", t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.SITENAME as "sitename", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t1.CN as "cn", t1.VALUEZS as "valuezs", t1.ALARMTYPE as "alarmtype", t1.ALARMSTATUS as "alarmstatus", t1.ALARMINFO as "alarminfo", t1.SENDTIME as "sendtime", t1.SENDSTATUS as "sendstatus", t1.FILLTIME as "filltime", t1.FILLSTATUS as "fillstatus", t1.FILLMAN as "fillman", t1.FILLID as "fillid", t1.PORTNAME as "portname", t1.PORTID as "portid", t1.HLIMIT as "hlimit", t1.LOWLIMIT as "lowlimit", t1.NKHLIMIT as "nkhlimit", t1.NKLOWLIMIT as "nklowlimit", t1.CONTROL_LINE as "controlLine", t1.STANDARD_VALUE as "standardValue", t1.VALUE_REAL as "valueReal", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.ST as "st", t1.QN as "qn", t1.FLAG as "flag", t1.SITUATION_STATUS as "situationStatus" , t2.DEPARTMENTID as "departmentid", t2.DEPARTMENTNAME as "departmentName" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE t2 ON t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_ABNORMAL t3 ON t1.FILLID = t3.ABNORMAL_ID WHERE 1=1
t1.DATATIME >= #startTime#
t1.DATATIME <= #endTime#
t1.ALARMTYPE = #alarmtype#
t3.ABNORMAL_STATUS = #abnormalStatus#
t3.SITUATION_STATUS = #situationStatus#
$orderBy$
t1.DATATIME asc, t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc, t1.CN asc
